00022 #if DEBUG
00023 static void printch(byte ch, boolean eol = false) {
00024   if ((0x21 <= ch) && (ch <= 0x7e)) {
00025     Serial.print('\'');
00026     Serial.write(ch);
00027     if (eol) { Serial.println('\''); } else { Serial.print('\''); }
00028   } else {
00029     Serial.print("0x");
00030     if (eol) { Serial.println(ch, HEX); } else { Serial.print(ch, HEX); }
00031   }
00032 }
00033 #endif
00034 
00035 byte LC100Base::index(byte row) {
00036   return ((rowHome + row) % ROWS);
00037 }
00038 
00039 byte LC100Base::index(byte col, byte row) {
00040   return (index(row) * COLS) + (col % COLS);
00041 }
00042 
00043 byte LC100Base::one(byte value) {
00044   return (value > 0) ? (value - 1) : 0; // If 0 or missing, default is 1, and (1 - 1) is 0.
00045 }

00047 /*******************************************************************************
00048  * CURSOR
00049  ******************************************************************************/
00050 
00051 void LC100Base::setCursor(byte col, byte row) {
00052 #if DEBUG
00053   if (debugging) {
00054     Serial.print("setCursor ");
00055     Serial.print(col);
00056     Serial.print(' ');
00057     Serial.println(row);
00058   }
00059 #endif
00060   colCurrent = col % COLS;
00061   rowCurrent = row % ROWS;
00062   lcd.setCursor(colCurrent, rowCurrent);
00063 }
00064   
00065 /*******************************************************************************
00066  * FRAME BUFFER
00067  ******************************************************************************/
00068 
00069 size_t LC100Base::emit(uint8_t ch) {
00070 #if DEBUG
00071   if (debugging) {
00072     Serial.print("emit ");
00073     printch(ch);
00074     Serial.print(' ');
00075     Serial.print(COLS);
00076     Serial.print(' ');
00077     Serial.print(ROWS);
00078     Serial.print(' ');
00079     Serial.print(colCurrent);
00080     Serial.print(' ');
00081     Serial.print(rowCurrent);
00082     Serial.print(' ');
00083     Serial.print(rowHome);
00084     Serial.print(' ');
00085     Serial.print(index(rowCurrent));
00086     Serial.print(' ');
00087     Serial.print(index(colCurrent, rowCurrent));
00088     Serial.print(' ');
00089     Serial.println(lineLength[index(rowCurrent)]);
00090   }
00091 #endif
00092   size_t result = lcd.write(ch);
00093   frameBuffer[index(colCurrent++, rowCurrent)] = ch;
00094   if (ch == ' ') {
00095     if (lineLength[index(rowCurrent)] == colCurrent) {
00096       lineLength[index(rowCurrent)] = colCurrent - 1;
00097     }
00098   } else {
00099     if (lineLength[index(rowCurrent)] < colCurrent) {
00100       lineLength[index(rowCurrent)] = colCurrent;
00101     }
00102   }
00103   if (milliseconds > 0) {
00104     delay(milliseconds);
00105   }
00106   return result;
00107 }
00108 
00109 void LC100Base::erase(byte colFrom, byte rowFrom, byte colTo, byte rowTo) {
00110 #if DEBUG
00111   if (debugging) {
00112     Serial.print("erase ");
00113     Serial.print(colFrom);
00114     Serial.print(' ');
00115     Serial.print(rowFrom);
00116     Serial.print(' ');
00117     Serial.print(colTo);
00118     Serial.print(' ');
00119     Serial.println(rowTo);
00120   }
00121 #endif
00122   byte colHome = colCurrent;
00123   byte rowHome = rowCurrent;
00124   colFrom %= COLS;
00125   rowFrom %= ROWS;
00126   colTo %= COLS;
00127   rowTo %= ROWS;
00128   for (byte row = rowFrom; row <= rowTo; ++row) {
00129     setCursor(colFrom, row);
00130     for (byte col = colFrom; col <= colTo; ++col) {
00131       emit(' ');
00132     }
00133     if (colTo < (COLS - 1)) {
00134       // Do nothing.
00135     } else if (colFrom == 0) {
00136       lineLength[index(row)] = 0;
00137     } else {
00138       lineLength[index(row)] = colFrom - 1;
00139     }
00140   }
00141   setCursor(colHome, rowHome);
00142 }
00143 
00144 size_t LC100Base::frame(uint8_t ch) {
00145 #if DEBUG
00146   if (debugging) {
00147     Serial.print("frame ");
00148     printch(ch, true);
00149   }
00150 #endif
00151   size_t result = 0;
00152   do {
00153     if (colCurrent < COLS) {
00154       // Do nothing.
00155     } else if (!wrapping) {
00156       break;
00157     } else if (rowCurrent < (ROWS - 1)) {
00158       setCursor(0, rowCurrent + 1);
00159       lineLength[index(rowCurrent)] = 0;
00160     } else if (!scrolling) {
00161       erase(0, rowCurrent, COLS - 1, rowCurrent);
00162       setCursor(0, rowCurrent);
00163       lineLength[index(rowCurrent)] = 0;
00164     } else {
00165       up();
00166     }
00167     result = emit(ch);
00168   } while (false);
00169   return result;
00170 }

00172 /*******************************************************************************
00173  * SCROLLING
00174  ******************************************************************************/
00175 
00176 void LC100Base::down() {
00177 #if DEBUG
00178   if (debugging) {
00179     Serial.print("down ");
00180     Serial.print(rowBegin);
00181     Serial.print(' ');
00182     Serial.println(rowEnd);
00183   }
00184 #endif
00185   lcd.clear();
00186   for (byte row = rowEnd; row > rowBegin; --row) {
00187     lcd.setCursor(0, row);
00188     for (byte col = 0; col < lineLength[index(row - 1)]; ++col) {
00189       lcd.write(frameBuffer[index(col, row - 1)]);
00190     }
00191   }
00192   setCursor(0, rowBegin);
00193   rowHome = (rowHome + ROWS - 1) % ROWS;
00194   lineLength[index(rowCurrent)] = 0;
00195 }
00196 
00197 void LC100Base::up() { 
00198 #if DEBUG
00199   if (debugging) {
00200     Serial.print("up ");
00201     Serial.print(rowBegin);
00202     Serial.print(' ');
00203     Serial.println(rowEnd);
00204   }
00205 #endif
00206   lcd.clear();
00207   for (byte row = rowBegin; row < rowEnd; ++row) {
00208     lcd.setCursor(0, row);
00209     for (byte col = 0; col < lineLength[index(row + 1)]; ++col) {
00210       lcd.write(frameBuffer[index(col, row + 1)]);
00211     }
00212   }
00213   setCursor(0, rowEnd);
00214   rowHome = (rowHome + 1) % ROWS;
00215   lineLength[index(rowCurrent)] = 0;
00216 }
00217 
00218 /*******************************************************************************
00219  * DISPLAY
00220  ******************************************************************************/
00221 
00222 void LC100Base::home() {
00223 #if DEBUG
00224   if (debugging) {
00225     Serial.print("home");
00226   }
00227 #endif
00228   colCurrent = 0;
00229   rowCurrent = 0;
00230   lcd.home();
00231 }
00232 
00233 void LC100Base::clear() {
00234 #if DEBUG
00235   if (debugging) {
00236     Serial.println("clear");
00237   }
00238 #endif
00239   lcd.clear();
00240   memset(lineLength, 0, ROWS);
00241   memset(frameBuffer, ' ', ROWS * COLS);
00242   rowHome = rowBegin;
00243   setCursor(rowCurrent, colCurrent); // MS-DOS homes the cursor, but leaving it where it was seems to be the standard.
00244 }
00245 
00246 size_t LC100Base::write(uint8_t ch0) {
00247   size_t result = 1;
00248   int ch = ch0;
00249   Action action = CONSUMED;
00250   byte colTemporary;
00251   while (ch > 0) {
00252  #if DEBUG
00253     if (debugging) {
00254       Serial.print("write ");
00255       printch(ch);
00256       Serial.write(' ');
00257       Serial.print(levelCurrent);
00258       Serial.write(' ');
00259       Serial.write(state[levelCurrent]);
00260       Serial.write(' ');
00261       Serial.write(action);
00262       Serial.write(' ');
00263       Serial.println(decimal);
00264     }
00265 #endif
00266     switch (state[levelCurrent]) {
00267       case DATA:
00268         switch (ch) {
00269           case '\b':
00270             setCursor((colCurrent + COLS - 1), rowCurrent);
00271             break;
00272           case '\t':
00273             for (byte col = colCurrent + 1; col < COLS; ++col) {
00274               if (tabSettings[col]) {
00275                 setCursor(col, rowCurrent);
00276                 break;
00277               }
00278             }
00279             break;
00280           case '\n':
00281             colTemporary = newlining? 0 : colCurrent;
00282             if (rowCurrent < (ROWS - 1)) {
00283               setCursor(colTemporary, rowCurrent + 1);
00284               lineLength[index(rowCurrent)] = 0;
00285             } else {
00286               up();
00287               setCursor(colTemporary, rowCurrent);
00288             }
00289             break;
00290           case '\v':
00291             setCursor(colCurrent, rowCurrent + 1);
00292             break;
00293           case '\f':
00294             colCurrent = 0;
00295             rowCurrent = 0;
00296             clear();
00297             break;
00298           case '\r':
00299             if (!newlining) {
00300               setCursor(0, rowCurrent);
00301             } else if (rowCurrent < (ROWS - 1)) {
00302               setCursor(0, rowCurrent + 1);
00303               lineLength[index(rowCurrent)] = 0;
00304             } else {
00305               up();
00306             }
00307             break;
00308           case ESC:
00309             state[++levelCurrent] = ESCAPE;
00310             break;
00311           case DEL:
00312             setCursor(colCurrent + COLS - 1, rowCurrent);
00313             emit(' ');
00314             setCursor(colCurrent + COLS - 1, rowCurrent);
00315             break;
00316           default:
00317             result = frame(ch);
00318             break;
00319         }
00320         break;
00321       case ESCAPE:
00322         switch (ch) {
00323           case '[':
00324             state[levelCurrent] = BRACKET;
00325             break;
00326           case '(':
00327           case ')':
00328             action = COMPLETE;
00329             break;
00330           case 'c':
00331             wrapping = true;
00332             scrolling = true;
00333             action = COMPLETE;
00334             break;
00335           case 'D':
00336             down();
00337             action = COMPLETE;
00338             break;
00339           case 'M':
00340             up();
00341             action = COMPLETE;
00342             break;
00343           case '7':
00344             colSaved = colCurrent;
00345             rowSaved = rowCurrent;
00346             action = COMPLETE;
00347             break;
00348           case '8':
00349             colCurrent = colSaved;
00350             rowCurrent = rowSaved;
00351             action = COMPLETE;
00352             break;
00353           case 'H':
00354             tabSettings[colCurrent] = true;
00355             action = COMPLETE;
00356             break;
00357           default:
00358             action = UNKNOWN;
00359             break;
00360         }
00361         break;
00362       case BRACKET:
00363         switch (ch) {
00364           case 'A':
00365             setCursor(colCurrent, rowCurrent + ROWS - 1);
00366             action = COMPLETE;
00367             break;
00368           case 'B':
00369             setCursor(colCurrent, rowCurrent + 1);
00370             action = COMPLETE;
00371             break;
00372           case 'C':
00373             setCursor(colCurrent + 1, rowCurrent);
00374             action = COMPLETE;
00375             break;
00376           case 'D':
00377             setCursor(colCurrent + COLS - 1, rowCurrent);
00378             action = COMPLETE;
00379             break;
00380           case 'H':
00381             colCurrent = 0;
00382             rowCurrent = 0;
00383             lcd.home();
00384             action = COMPLETE;
00385             break;
00386           case 'J':
00387             erase(colCurrent, rowCurrent, COLS - 1, rowCurrent);
00388             if (rowCurrent < (ROWS - 1)) {
00389               erase(0, rowCurrent + 1, COLS - 1, ROWS - 1);
00390             }
00391             action = COMPLETE;
00392             break;
00393           case 'K':
00394             erase(colCurrent, rowCurrent, COLS - 1, rowCurrent);
00395             action = COMPLETE;
00396             break;
00397           case 'c':
00398             Serial.write(ESC);
00399             Serial.print("[10c");
00400             action = COMPLETE;
00401             break;
00402           case 'g':
00403             tabSettings[colCurrent] = false;
00404             action = COMPLETE;
00405             break;
00406           case '0':
00407           case '1':
00408           case '2':
00409           case '3':
00410           case '4':
00411           case '5':
00412           case '6':
00413           case '7':
00414           case '8':
00415           case '9':
00416             decimal = 0;
00417             state[levelCurrent++] = FIRST;
00418             state[levelCurrent] = DECIMAL;
00419             action = CONTINUE;
00420             break;
00421           case '?':
00422             decimal = 0;
00423             state[levelCurrent++] = QUESTION;
00424             state[levelCurrent] = DECIMAL;
00425             break;
00426           default:
00427             action = UNKNOWN;
00428             break;
00429         }
00430         break;
00431       case FIRST:
00432         switch (ch) {
00433           case ';':
00434             first = decimal;
00435             decimal = 0;
00436             state[levelCurrent++] = SECOND;
00437             state[levelCurrent] = DECIMAL;
00438             action = CONSUMED;
00439             break;
00440           case 'A':
00441             setCursor(colCurrent, rowCurrent + ROWS - (one(decimal) % ROWS));
00442             action = COMPLETE;
00443             break;
00444           case 'B':
00445             setCursor(colCurrent, rowCurrent + one(decimal));
00446             action = COMPLETE;
00447             break;
00448           case 'C':
00449             setCursor(colCurrent + one(decimal), rowCurrent);
00450             action = COMPLETE;
00451             break;
00452           case 'D':
00453             setCursor(colCurrent + COLS - (one(decimal) % ROWS), rowCurrent);
00454             action = COMPLETE;
00455             break;
00456           case 'J':
00457             switch (decimal) {
00458               case 0:
00459                 erase(colCurrent, rowCurrent, COLS - 1, rowCurrent);
00460                 if (rowCurrent < (ROWS - 1)) {
00461                   erase(0, rowCurrent + 1, COLS - 1, ROWS - 1);
00462                 }
00463                 action = COMPLETE;
00464                 break;
00465               case 1:
00466                 if (rowCurrent > 0) {
00467                   erase(0, 0, COLS - 1, rowCurrent - 1);
00468                 }
00469                 erase(0, rowCurrent, colCurrent, rowCurrent);
00470                 action = COMPLETE;
00471                 break;
00472               case 2:
00473                 clear();
00474                 action = COMPLETE;
00475                 break;
00476               default:
00477                 action = UNKNOWN;
00478                 break;
00479             }
00480             break;
00481           case 'K':
00482             switch (decimal) {
00483               case 0:
00484                 erase(colCurrent, rowCurrent, COLS - 1, rowCurrent);
00485                 action = COMPLETE;
00486                 break;
00487               case 1:
00488                 erase(0, rowCurrent, colCurrent, rowCurrent);
00489                 action = COMPLETE;
00490                 break;
00491               case 2:
00492                 erase(0, rowCurrent, COLS - 1, rowCurrent);
00493                 action = COMPLETE;
00494                 break;
00495               default:
00496                 action = UNKNOWN;
00497                 break;
00498             }
00499             break;
00500           case 'g':
00501             switch (decimal) {
00502               case 3:
00503                 for (byte col = 0; col < COLS; ++col) {
00504                   tabSettings[col] = false;
00505                 }
00506                 break;
00507               default:
00508                 action = UNKNOWN;
00509                 break;
00510             }
00511             break;
00512           case 'h':
00513             switch (decimal) {
00514               case 7:
00515                 wrapping = true;
00516                 action = COMPLETE;
00517                 break;
00518               case 20:
00519                 newlining = true;
00520                 action = COMPLETE;
00521                 break;
00522               default:
00523                 action = UNKNOWN;
00524                 break;
00525             }
00526             break;
00527           case 'l':
00528             switch (decimal) {
00529               case 7:
00530                 wrapping = false;
00531                 action = COMPLETE;
00532                 break;
00533               case 20:
00534                 newlining = false;
00535                 action = COMPLETE;
00536                 break;
00537               default:
00538                 action = UNKNOWN;
00539                 break;
00540             }
00541             break;
00542           case 'n':
00543             switch (decimal) {
00544               case 5:
00545                 Serial.write(ESC);
00546                 Serial.print("[0n");
00547                 action = COMPLETE;
00548                 break;
00549               case 6:
00550                 Serial.write(ESC);
00551                 Serial.print('[');
00552                 Serial.print(rowCurrent);
00553                 Serial.print(';');
00554                 Serial.print(colCurrent);
00555                 Serial.print('R');
00556                 action = COMPLETE;
00557                 break;
00558               case 7:
00559                 Serial.write(ESC);
00560                 Serial.print("[0n");
00561                 action = COMPLETE;
00562                 break;
00563               default:
00564                 action = UNKNOWN;
00565                 break;
00566             }
00567             break;
00568           default:
00569             action = UNKNOWN;
00570             break;
00571         }
00572         break;
00573       case SECOND:
00574         switch (ch) {
00575           case 'r':
00576             rowBegin = one(first) % ROWS;
00577             rowEnd = one(decimal) % ROWS;
00578             action = COMPLETE;
00579             break;
00580           case 'H':
00581           case 'f':
00582             setCursor(one(decimal), one(first));
00583             action = COMPLETE;
00584             break;
00585           default:
00586             action = UNKNOWN;
00587             break;
00588         }
00589         break;
00590       case QUESTION:
00591         switch (ch) {
00592           case 'h':
00593             switch (decimal) {
00594               case 7:
00595                 wrapping = true;
00596                 action = COMPLETE;
00597                 break;
00598               default:
00599                 action = UNKNOWN;
00600                 break;
00601             }
00602             break;
00603           case 'l':
00604             switch (decimal) {
00605               case 7:
00606                 wrapping = false;
00607                 action = COMPLETE;
00608                 break;
00609               default:
00610                 action = UNKNOWN;
00611                 break;
00612             }
00613             break;
00614           default:
00615             action = UNKNOWN;
00616             break;
00617         }
00618         break;
00619       case DECIMAL:
00620         switch (ch) {
00621           case '0':
00622           case '1':
00623           case '2':
00624           case '3':
00625           case '4':
00626           case '5':
00627           case '6':
00628           case '7':
00629           case '8':
00630           case '9':
00631             decimal = (decimal * 10) + (ch - '0');
00632             action = CONSUMED;
00633             break;
00634           default:
00635             action = TERMINAL;
00636             break;
00637         }
00638         break;
00639       default:
00640         action = INSANE;
00641         break;
00642     }
00643     switch (action) {
00644       case INSANE:
00645         levelCurrent = 1;
00646         state[0] = DATA;
00647       case UNKNOWN:
00648         frame(ch);
00649       case COMPLETE:
00650         --levelCurrent;
00651       case CONSUMED:
00652         ch = -1;
00653       case CONTINUE:
00654         break;
00655       case TERMINAL:
00656         --levelCurrent;
00657         break;
00658     }
00659   }
00660   return result;
00661 }
00662   
00663 /*******************************************************************************
00664  * JOYSTICK
00665  ******************************************************************************/
00666 
00667 int LC100Base::read(char * buffer /* [4] */) {
00668   int length = 0;
00669   Display::Read sample = lcd.read();
00670   if (!sampling) {
00671     while ((sample != Display::NONE) && (lcd.read() == sample)) {
00672         // Do nothing.
00673     }
00674   }
00675 #if DEBUGGING
00676   if (debugging && (sample != Display::NONE)) {
00677      Serial.println("read ");
00678      printch(sample, true);
00679   }
00680 #endif
00681   switch (sample) {
00682     case Display::LEFT:
00683     case Display::DOWN:
00684     case Display::UP:
00685     case Display::RIGHT:
00686       length = 4;
00687       buffer[0] = ESC;
00688       buffer[1] = '[';
00689       switch (sample) {
00690         case Display::LEFT:
00691           buffer[2] = 'D';
00692           break;
00693         case Display::DOWN:
00694           buffer[2] = 'B';
00695           break;
00696         case Display::UP:
00697           buffer[2] = 'A';
00698           break;
00699         case Display::RIGHT:
00700           buffer[2] = 'C';
00701           break;
00702         default:
00703           // Do nothing.
00704           break;
00705       }
00706       buffer[3] = '\0';
00707       break;
00708     case Display::SELECT:
00709       length = 2;
00710       buffer[0] = '\n';
00711       buffer[1] = '\0';
00712       break;
00713     default:
00714       // Do nothing.
00715       break;
00716   }
00717   return length;
00718 }
00719   
00720 /*******************************************************************************
00721  * INITIALIZATION
00722  ******************************************************************************/
00723 
00724 void LC100Base::begin() {
00725   memset(lineLength, 0, ROWS);
00726   memset(frameBuffer, ' ', ROWS * COLS);
00727   memset(tabSettings, 0, COLS);
00728   state[levelCurrent] = DATA;
00729   lcd.begin(COLS, ROWS);
00730   clear();
00731 }
00732 
00733 }
00734 }
